name: material-time-lite
description: A small and simple time picker based on google material UI

scripts.unit-test: npm run clear-old-tests && npm run build-unit-tests && npm run build-test-html && npm run mocha-unit-test
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-html-template && npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod
scripts.develop: npm run build-html-template && npm run build-css && node "./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js" --config "./webpack/dev.config.js" --watch

author: Shane Connon
